Notes.Text:
This update for LibVNCServer fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2017-18922: Fixed an issue which could have allowed to an attacker to pre-auth overwrite a function pointer 
  which subsequently used leading to potential remote code execution (bsc#1173477).
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: It was discovered that websockets.c in LibVNCServer prior to 0.9.12 did not properly decode certain WebSocket frames. A malicious attacker could exploit this by sending specially crafted WebSocket frames to a server, causing a heap-based buffer overflow.
